程序包 io.github.moyusowo.neoartisanapi.api.recipe

接口 ArtisanRecipe

所有已知子接口:
ArtisanBlastingRecipe, ArtisanCampfireRecipe, ArtisanFurnaceLikeRecipe, ArtisanFurnaceRecipe, ArtisanShapedRecipe, ArtisanShapelessRecipe, ArtisanSmokingRecipe
public interface ArtisanRecipe
Core abstract interface of the custom recipe system, defining the common contract for all recipe types.

Design philosophy:

  • Immutability - All implementation classes should be immutable
  • Generative design - Result items are dynamically created through generators
另请参阅:
  • shaped crafting recipe
  • shapeless crafting recipe
  • furnace recipe
  • smoker recipe
  • campfire recipe
  • blast furnace recipe

    • matches

      boolean matches(ItemStack @NotNull [] matrix)
      Checks if the given item matrix matches this recipe
      参数:
      matrix - the item matrix to check (cannot be null)
      返回:
      true if the matrix matches this recipe, false otherwise
